BaseTemplate.made_with: Simplifying real estate transactions across Queensland.

Index.meta_description: Queensland's innovative real estate platform connecting independent agents and private sellers with premium listing services for residential and commercial properties.

Hero.title: A Smarter Way to Buy & Sell Property in Queensland
Hero.slogan: We put you in control of your property sale — full support if you want it, full independence if you don't — all for less.
Hero.subtitle: Realty Direct provides a flexible platform for property transactions with professional listing services and direct portal access.
Hero.agent_description: Access our infrastructure and listing services without costly portal agreements.
Hero.seller_description: Sell your property directly with professional listing services and support.
Hero.search_placeholder: Search properties by location, type, or features...
Hero.popular_searches: Popular: Gold Coast, Brisbane, Residential, Commercial

Features.caption: OUR SERVICES
Features.title: A Better Real Estate Experience
Features.subtitle: We provide innovative solutions for property transactions across Queensland
Features.listing_management_description: Get your property listed on major real estate portals with professional presentation and premium positioning.
Features.premium_marketing_description: Quality photography, eBrochures, social media promotion and campaign analytics to maximize exposure.
Features.portal_access_description: Direct access to realestate.com.au, Domain, and international property sites through our partnerships.
Features.cost_savings_description: Save thousands on traditional agency commissions while still getting professional marketing and exposure.
Features.agent_support_description: Independent agents can leverage our platform without maintaining costly portal agreements.
Features.expert_guidance_description: Professional support throughout the entire property transaction process for both agents and sellers.

About.meta_description: Learn about Queensland's innovative online real estate agency connecting independent agents and property sellers.
About.about_paragraph: At Realty Direct, we're passionate about reinventing the real estate experience in Queensland. Our platform empowers independent agents and property owners with professional listing services, marketing tools, and direct access to major property portals.

FeaturedProperties.caption: FEATURED LISTINGS
FeaturedProperties.title: Discover Prime Properties
FeaturedProperties.subtitle: Browse our selection of premium properties across Queensland

QueenslandLocations.caption: PROPERTY LOCATIONS
QueenslandLocations.title: Discover Queensland Properties
QueenslandLocations.subtitle: Explore real estate opportunities in these popular Queensland locations

ServiceCategories.caption: OUR SERVICES
ServiceCategories.title: Full-Service Real Estate Solutions
ServiceCategories.subtitle: We offer comprehensive services for both independent agents and property sellers
ServiceCategories.listing_management_description: Professional property listings on major real estate portals with premium positioning and marketing features.
ServiceCategories.marketing_tools_description: Professional photography, brochures, social media marketing and campaign analytics to maximize exposure.
ServiceCategories.portal_access_description: Access to realestate.com.au, Domain, and international property sites through our partnerships.
ServiceCategories.agent_support_description: Expert guidance and support for both independent agents and private sellers throughout the sales process.

Testimonials.caption: SUCCESS STORIES
Testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
Testimonials.agent_testimonial_quote: Realty Direct has been a game-changer for my independent real estate business. Their platform gives me all the tools I need without the franchise fees or portal agreement costs.
Testimonials.seller_testimonial_quote: Selling my property directly through Realty Direct saved me thousands in commission while still getting professional marketing and exposure on all the major portals.

PropertyListing.meta_title: List Your Property - Realty Direct Queensland
PropertyListing.meta_description: List your Queensland property for sale. Choose to sell independently or with the support of an online agent through Realty Direct's flexible platform.
PropertyListing.caption: LIST YOUR PROPERTY
PropertyListing.title: Simple 3-Step Property Listing
PropertyListing.subtitle: We've made listing your Queensland property quick and easy
PropertyListing.step_2_description: Optionally select an agent to represent you
PropertyListing.form_features_placeholder: E.g. Pool, renovated kitchen, air conditioning
PropertyListing.agent_selection_title: Do you want an agent to represent you?
PropertyListing.agent_selection_description: Selecting an agent is optional. You can still get your property listed on major portals without an agent.
PropertyListing.review_description: Please review your property details before submitting
PropertyListing.confirmation_description: Your property has been submitted and will be reviewed shortly. We'll contact you within 24 hours to finalize your listing.
next_steps: Our team will review your property details
We'll contact you to arrange professional photography (if required)
Your property will be listed on major real estate portals
You'll receive access to your seller dashboard to track interest
